text:
October 9, 1964
Mrs. Mary Ann Buddington
Nat. Assn, of Educational Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue
Washington 36, D. C.
Dear Mary Ann,
Would you please send me a list of the NAEB committee members
for 1964.65?
I would like to get into action and am not certain who is
currently on the committee.
Sincerely,
Mation Corvell
Associate Director
MC/hjk
